amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning the outsourcing of American jobs.

action.text: Amendment SA 2311 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2311.
Amendment SA 2311 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S968-969, S1007-1010; text: CR S968-969) To express the sense of the Senate concerning the outsourcing of American jobs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2311 proposed by Senator Clinton.
